about_the_game:
A narrative ASMR adventure in a supernatural barbershop.

“The Midnight Barber” blends rhythm mechanics and introspective storytelling.

Clara's mysterious barbershop doesn't open until midnight. She serves a clientele of vampires, sirens, werewolves and all the other creatures who have nowhere else to go for their grooming needs.

But as the country undergoes a shift from authoritarian dictatorship to democracy, Clara stumbles upon a secret that threatens to unravel a disturbing conspiracy. A secret that puts her in the crosshairs of the most influential individuals in Barcelona - supernatural or otherwise.

  • Trim to the Beat: Match your barber tools to your clients' inner rhythm in a soothing, relaxing experience.

  • A city in transition: Immerse yourself in late 70s Barcelona, a time of social change and political turmoil brimming with supernatural intrigue.

  • Absorbing atmosphere: The city comes alive through stunning hand-drawn art and a reactive, atmospheric soundtrack that evolves with your every move.

  • Stories that cut deep: Forge connections with a diverse cast of enchanted, discover their backstories, and influence their paths.

  • Drive the Conversation: Choose icebreakers and unlock new conversation topics and key information to solve your lines of inquiry.

  • Inside the Mirror: Progress in a client’s story to discover their inner demon—with a unique musical mini-game for every client.
